channel.title: Posts on Plaintext Audits

item.title: What we are up to
item.description: Paco I’ve been a contributor at alchemist for a lil while, I’m now cobbling together a bad frontend for Zora faucets as a proof of concept for the council to pay staked MIST with it. I got into the project by submitting an audit for the new AludelFactory, and stayed implementing the fixes ‘cause they are just too chill. Doug
